I got 99 problems and they all bitches Wish I was Jigga man carefree living But I m not Sean or Martin Louis I m that Cleveland nigga rolling with them Brooklyn Boys You know what I be when you start Only things that calm me down pussy and some cali tree And I get both never truly satisfied I am happy that s just the saddest lie I ve got some issues that nobody can see And all of these emotions keep pouring outta me I bring them to the light for you it s only right This is The Soundtrack 2 my life The Soundtrack 2 my life oh
